trailingComments.value:
*
 * Controls the textarea input
 *
 * #### SCSS Import
 * ```
 * @import "~@orloxx/ui-core/scss/form/textarea";
 * ```
 *
 * @extends {Field}
 *
 * @example
 * <TextareaField id='email' name='email' label='Email' />

leadingComments.value:
*
   * @type {Object}
   * @property {number} [maxChars] - The maximum number of characters limit
   * @property {String} [maxCharsError='You reached the maximum number of characters allowed'] - The error message when the number of characters has been reached

extra.rawValue: You reached the maximum number of characters allowed
extra.raw: 'You reached the maximum number of characters allowed'

value.value: You reached the maximum number of characters allowed
